text: Tonči Gabrić (11 November 1961 – 28 October 2024) was a Croatian professional footballer. He played as a goalkeeper. Gabrić played for the Croatia national football team from 1990 to 1997. Gabrić died in Split, Croatia on 28 October 2024, at the age of 62. ==References== Category:1961 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Croatian footballers Category:Sportspeople from Split
title: Tonči Gabrić
